option1.name: includeChildProjects

option2.name: includeNonRuntimeInventory
option2.label: Include Non Runtime dependency items? (True/False)
option2.description: Should the report include data for dependencies that are not of a Runtime scope? (True/False)

option3.name: includeFileDetails
option3.label: Include file level information? (True/False)

option4.name: includeUnassociatedFiles
option4.label: Include files that are not associated to inventory items? (True/False)
